mapper.select: SELECT EMP.EMP_ID , EMP.COM_CODE , EMP.DEP_ID , EMP.JOB_ID , EMP.EMP_PASS , EMP.EMP_NM , EMP.EMP_BID , EMP.EMP_MAIL , EMP.EMP_PH , EMP.EMP_ADDR , EMP.EMP_SIGN , EMP_STA , POW.POW_ROLE , ATT.ATT_NO , ATT.ATT_FNM , ATT.ATT_SNM , DEPT.DEP_ID , DEPT.DEP_HDC , DEPT.DEP_TNM , DEPT.DEP_NM , DEPT.DEP_MAG , J.JOB_ID , J.JOB_NM , COM.COM_CNM FROM EMPLOYEE EMP LEFT OUTER JOIN POWER POW ON (EMP.EMP_ID = POW.EMP_ID) LEFT OUTER JOIN ATTATCH ATT ON (EMP.EMP_ID = ATT.EMP_ID) LEFT OUTER JOIN DEPARTMENT DEPT ON (EMP.DEP_ID = DEPT.DEP_ID) LEFT OUTER JOIN JOB J ON (EMP.JOB_ID = J.JOB_ID) INNER JOIN COMPANY COM ON (EMP.COM_CODE = COM.COM_CODE) WHERE EMP.EMP_ID = #{username}
SELECT COM_CODE, COM_ID, COM_PASS, COM_NM, COM_PH, COM_MAIL, COM_CNM, COM_CEO, COM_TEL, COM_ADDR, COM_DIV FROM COMPANY WHERE COM_ID = #{username}
